description: This file is a minimal stub implementation of core components for the WPEFramework's Core namespace, used primarily for testing purposes in the app-gateway2 project. It defines basic types, constants, interfaces, and singleton patterns to facilitate testing without relying on full Thunder/WPEFramework SDK functionality.

classes.name: IUnknown
classes.description: A minimal COM-style interface with a virtual destructor and reference counting methods.

classes.name: IDispatch
classes.description: An interface representing a dispatchable unit with a virtual Dispatch method.

classes.name: IWorkerPool
classes.description: A singleton interface for a thread pool worker, with static methods to check availability, assign, and retrieve the instance.

classes.name: WorkerPool
classes.description: A stub implementation of IWorkerPool, representing a thread pool, with constructor parameters for configuration.

classes.name: IStore
classes.description: A singleton interface for message storage, with static methods to get and set the message store.
